content: Conducting Monetary Policy  with a Large Balance Sheet  Stanley Fischer  Vice Chairman Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System  Monetary Policy Forum New York, New York February 27, 2015  For release on delivery 1:30 p.m. EST February 27, 2015
